page.title: 16Education in Nibley.
page.content: North Nibley primary school was closed during part of June because the toilet block could not be used.The school is a church aided school and the exterior repairs are being paid for by the county.At the moment there are arguments as to who is responsible for paying for the repairs needed. Portaloos were installed at the time but there was still the question of the cost.The parents did not mind the children having time off in relation to inconveniencing their work,because it is a pleasant and social area to live in with everyone willing to help friends.The school itself employs 4 teachers and has 64 pupils.The teachers are of varied religions but the church has no objections.The school has the use of peripatetic music teachers and mother helpers.
